nodes.text: Pulse cannons were incredibly powerful, long-range rifles which utilized the frame assemblies of DLT-20A blaster rifles. During the Galactic Civil War, pulse cannons were the weapon of choice for many sharpshooters. The IG-series bounty hunter IG-88 used a pulse cannon.

Pulse cannons appear in Star Wars Battlefront, a canon video game developed by DICE and released in 2015. In Battlefront, pulse cannons are a type of "Star Card," hands which players can select and add to their loadout and then use during matches.
